title: Fed Backing Gradual Hikes, Terrific Year for Autos, Previewing Jobs Report
itunes:title: Fed Backing Gradual Hikes, Terrific Year for Autos, Previewing Jobs Report
description:
Jeffrey Cleveland, Chief Economist at Payden & Rygel, recaps the FOMC minutes and why he is upbeat on the U.S. economy. Michelle Krebs, Senior Analyst at Autotrader, breaks down December vehicle sales. Josh Wright, Chief Economist at iCIMS, looks at the labor market and impact on the economy. We drive to the Close with Jim Russell, Portfolio Manager at Bahl & Gaynor. And Carol and Pimm Fox hit today’s “Movers and Shakers” on Wall Street and Bloomberg Stocks Editor Dave Wilson has his “Stock of the Day.”  

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:

itunes:author: Bloomberg
